bill.summary: This bill allows the Department of the Interior to acquire lands or interests in any property within the Ste. Genevieve Historic District National Historic Landmark in Missouri and to acquire from Independence, Missouri, approximately 1.08 acres of land for inclusion in the Harry S Truman National Historic Site. The bill also renames the original enactment as the "Harry S Truman National Historic Site Establishment Act."
